title: Isometries between the spaces of L^1 holomorphic quadratic differentials on Riemann surfaces of finite type
abstract: By applying the methods of V. Markovic [7] to the special case of Riemann surfaces of finite type, we obtain a transparent new proof of a classical result about isometries between the spaces of L^1 holomorphic quadratic differentials on such surfaces.
note:
© 2003 Duke University Press.

Received 11 July 2003. Revision received 14 August 2003.

Markovic’s research partly supported by an Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council advanced research fellowship.

C. Earle thanks the Mathematics Institute of the University of Warwick for its hospitality while the research reported here was carried out.
